description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 10/13/2006

Thorne feels shocked and betrayed by Taylor’s lies. Taylor tries to explain exactly what happened the night of the accident, but Thorne rejects her. Later, Taylor calls Lt. Baker and confesses to killing Darla. She tells Thorne that she loves him and Alexandria. Thorne is devastated.  Stephanie, Phoebe, and Hector worry that Thorne will call the police when he finds out what Taylor did. Lt. Baker pays a visit to Taylor’s house and is there when Taylor calls him to confess.  Lt. Baker puts Taylor on speaker and everyone listens in shock to Taylor’s confession.
